pages.text: For every block.minecraft.copper_block, points are added to the total according to:$(br)(blocks)^0.45 * 2
For every block.minecraft.iron_block, points are added to the total according to:$(br)(blocks)^0.6 * 2
For every block.minecraft.gold_block, points are added to the total according to:$(br)(blocks)^0.95 * 0.5
For every block.minecraft.amethyst_block, points are added to the total according to:$(br)min(blocks, 8) * 8
For every block.minecraft.emerald_block, points are added to the total according to:$(br)(blocks)^0.95
For every block.minecraft.diamond_block, points are added to the total according to:$(br)(blocks)^0.75 * 5
For every block.minecraft.netherite_block, the total number of points is multiplied by:$(br)1 + (blocks * 0.05)
